description:
The beauty of winter camping is much easier to appreciate after a great night’s sleep. Loaded 800 fill hydrophobic ProDown™, the Inferno has what it takes to keep you cozy. Updated this year with recycled fabrics, this bag is now green in colour and spirit. It offers maximal thermal efficiency with a distinct bottom, sides and top, each with system of baffles that prevent down migration. The ½ length zip, fitted hood and draft collar reduce the places that warm air can escape.

  • 800 fill-power hydrophobic ProDown absorbs less water, dries faster and retains loft better than conventional down
  • Goose down is ethically sourced and meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Recycled nylon fabric gets an internal aluminized XReflex™ coating that reflects your body heat
  • Generous profile gives you room to layer
  • Trapezoidal side baffles prevent cold spots
  • Fitted hood hugs the head and neck, so there’s nowhere for cold air to pool
  • Full draft collar and hood overlap to prevent heal loss
  • Hood can be adjusted on either side
  • Internal insulated pocket
  • ½ length center zip
  • Roomy vaulted footbox
  • Tie down loops to secure your pad to your sleeping bag
  • Includes a compression stuff sack and a home storage bag
name: The North Face Inferno -18C Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
